pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bitcoin XT is an implementation of a Bitcoin full node that embraces Bitcoin's original vision of simple, reliable, low-cost transactions for everyone in the world. Bitcoin XT originated as a series of patches on top of Bitcoin Core and is now a independently maintained software fork.

use.flag: Build the end-user Qt GUI for the Bitcoin crypto-currency
Enable generation of QR Codes for receiving payments
Attempt to reduce exported symbols in the resulting executables
Enable command-line client and transaction tool
Report blocks and transactions via zeromq
